name: Super Souper
description:
Porkston is a picky pig. So picky, in fact, that every time he goes out to eat his tastes change. Can you craft the perfect soups for Porkston?

  • Move Porkston left and right with stick
  • Press A or B to eat left or right soup
  • Collect GREAT or FINE food
  • Avoid TERRIBLE food
  •  Stack ingredients for score multipliers and time bonuses

This project started at BGSjamXIII
